actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 12). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the crocodile can't bite another target.
actions.name: Bite

traits.description: The crocodile can hold its breath for 15 minutes.
traits.name: Hold Breath
